sentences.english: And I really love the Junya Watanabe pieces that are in the next room.
sentences.chinese: 还有我真的很喜欢隔壁一间房间里渡边淳弥的衣服。

sentences.english: The archaeologist dated the ruins as belonging to the early Minoan period.
sentences.chinese: 这位考古学家确定该废墟属于早期弥诺斯时期。
